articles.description: Alcaraz managed to crack the Tommy Paul code in Ohio in a nerve-wracking encounter to prevail 7-6(6), 6-7(0), 6-3 and reach the quarters. | Tennis News
articles.content: With the world No. 1 ranking under threat and the wounds of an early Canadian Open exit still fresh from the previous week, the Tommy Paul encounter on Thursday held utmost importance for Carlos Alca… [+3132 chars]

articles.author: Akshay Ramesh
articles.title: Cricket World Cup 2023 buildup: What India can learn from England, Australia and South Africa - India Today
articles.description: Cricket World Cup 2023: While India are yet to name their squad for the Asia Cup, which is 12 days away, the likes of England, Australia, South Africa and New Zealand seem to have zeroed in on a settled line-up for their trip to India later this year.
articles.content: Australia have announced their provisional World Cup squad. So have England. New Zealand have named a strong squad, sans one of their biggest match-winner, for an upcoming bilateral series. The big b… [+7075 chars]
